actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to possible curtailment of oil supplies from Arab producers.

summary.text: Directs the President to reduce gasoline consumption by means of tax measures and by encouraging less driving, reduced highway speeds, and the development of smaller and more efficient automobile engines. Urges that research programs be emphasized to assure the United States of sufficient energy from domestic sources through: (1) developing techniques to convert coal and wood chips into oil and to make use of oil shale reserves; (2) devising new transportation systems; and (3) exploiting geothermal, solar, and nuclear energy.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to possible curtailment of oil supplies from Arab producers.
